languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Скорость{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличивается на 2, а {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} — на 1. Дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} от расстояния при применении Тарана кораблем увеличивается на 100%. Продолжительность: 2 раунда +1 раунд за каждые 20 очков навыка Атлетика у офицера на посту.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Flagship's speed is increased by +2 and its manoeuvrability is increased by +1. The bonus damage dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%.

Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} wird um +2 erhöht und seine {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} wird um +1 erhöht. Der Bonus-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, den {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Raumschiff-Rammbock{/g} basierend auf der zurückgelegten Distanz verursacht, wird um +100 % erhöht.
Dauer: 2 Runden +1 Runde für jede 20 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Athletik des Manövermeisters.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} um +2 und seine {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} um +1 erhöht. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonusschaden{/g}, den Raumschiff-Rammbock basierend auf der zurückgelegten Distanz verursacht, wird um +100% erhöht.

Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} um +2 und seine {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} um +1 erhöht. Der Bonus-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, den Raumschiff-Rammbock basierend auf der zurückgelegten Distanz verursacht, wird um +100 % erhöht. Dauer: +1 Runde für jede 10 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Athletik des Manövermeisters.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} augmente de +2 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de +1. Le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligé par {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Bélier de vaisseau spatial{/g} en fonction de la distance parcourue augmente de +100 %.
Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points de la compétence Athlétisme du maître des manœuvres.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} augmente de +2 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de +1. Le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligé par Bélier de vaisseau spatial en fonction de la distance parcourue augmente de +100 %. Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Athlétisme du maître des manœuvres.

La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} augmente de +2 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de +1. Le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligé par Bélier de vaisseau spatial en fonction de la distance parcourue augmente de +100 %. Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Athlétisme du maître des manœuvres.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}提高2点，{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}提高1点。此外，{g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}舰船撞角{/g}远距离移动造成的额外{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。
持续时间：两轮，机动大师每有20点运动技能，持续时间延长一轮。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}提高2点，{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}提高1点。此外，舰船撞角远距离移动造成的额外{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。 持续时间：两轮，机动大师每有20点运动技能，持续时间延长一轮。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} aumenta en +2 y su {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} en +1. La bonificación al {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Ariete de nave del vacío{/g} por recorrer distancia aumenta un +100 %.
Duración: 2 asaltos +1 asalto por cada 20 puntos de Atletismo del Maestro de maniobras.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} aumenta en +2 y su {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} en +1. La bonificación al {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de Ariete de nave del vacío por recorrer distancia aumenta un +100 %. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}が+2増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が+1増加する。ヴォイドシップ・ラムの移動距離に応じて与えられるボーナス{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+100%増加する。 持続時間：2ラウンド。戦略マスターの身体能力スキル20ごとに+1ラウンド。

The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}が+2増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が+1増加する。ヴォイドシップ・ラムの移動距離に応じて与えられるボーナス{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+100%増加する。 持続時間：2ラウンド。戦略マスターの身体能力スキル20ごとに+1ラウンド。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hızı{/g} +2, {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manevra kabiliyeti{/g} ise +1 artar. {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Uçsuz Gemisi Koçbaşı Vuruşu{/g} kabiliyetinin katedilen mesafeye bağlı olarak verdiği bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g} +%100 artar.
Süre: 2 raunt ve Manevra Ustası'nın Atletizm yeteneğindeki her 20 puan için +1 raunt.
